title: Opportunity cost irrelevant if unlimited resources

content.question: The concept of opportunity cost would no longer be relevant if

choices.label: poverty in an economy no longer existed
the supply of all resources were unlimited
all current incomes were invested in technological research

content.answer: the supply of all resources were unlimited

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
